readable.title: 1865794069_6e3a1e57bb
readable.content: A blond boy with a navy blue uniform kicks a soccer ball in an open field . A boy in an all blue uniform kicks a blue soccer ball in a grassy area . A little boy is playing soccer at a field . A small child plays with a ball while others relax and converse with one another . A young boy dressed in blue and white is kicking a soccer ball .
